#BlackMagicCraft #Episode138

In this epispode I complete my miniature tudor house build by doing the painting and adding some cool details like moss, weathering, and "glass" to the windows. 

The Vallejo Water Texture I used for the windows isn't on my "Essential Equipment" page, so if you want to grab some, you can do so via these links:

(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

(USA) https://amzn.to/2DyQv5E
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2IEKgkS
(UK) https://amzn.to/2KZ0Q0A
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2vlgB7s

title: Building a Foam House for Tabletop Gaming PART FOUR: PAINT
